name: Fairy Tales of Innocent Children
description:
When a child sees her mother fall from the sky, she goes into the woods to search for her... and finds something entirely different. Playtime: 5 minutes.

Content warning: Mentions of violence, suicide.

This game is the remastered version of my entry to a contest hosted by Hanako Games. Original contest thread here.

Full Credits

Character Art

A huge thank you to my little sister Rebbey, who created the gorgeous sprites. You can follow her on:

Facebook | Deviantart | Tumblr | Twitter | Instagram | Twitch | SoundCloud | Youtube

I wrote the script, and you can follow me on:

Twitter | Tumblr

Finally, I'd like to thank Carassaurat for everything.
